d3tm 0.4
  • Reference

    • Zoomable Treemap

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

d3tm 0.4

New Release (May 28th, 2021)

Major Changes

  • Rebuilt the Zoomable Treemap (ZTM) based on d3 version 6 with click and mouseover/mouseout events.
  • Added div container with relative position for more consistent tooltip performance.
  • Removed the non-zoomable version of the treemap.
  • Added a zoom to node feature

d3tm 0.3.2

New Release (July 19th, 2019)

Major Changes

  • Added a no zoomable version of the treemap

d3tm 0.3.1

New Release (January 7th, 2019)

Major Changes

  • Removed column names from data in d3_nest2 and added a variable to pass to the htmlWidget which places the vector into an array that is indexed based on depth (a94f49)
  • Added parent and child click and hover events for Shiny (0cd2cd)
  • Removed key field from d3_nest2 and added Shiny bindings for for click and hover events (99b0c2)
  • Update the tooltip so that it switches sides when it gets halfway across the element (c5eeb2)

d3tm 0.3

New Release (January 6th, 2019)

Major Changes

  • Rename from d3RZoomableTreemap to d3tm (d480b3)

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issue when rendering in a div that had style position equal to relative (89cca7)
  • Fixed issue where resizing the treemap window would revert back to starting level (b7d57b)

d3RZoomableTreemap 0.2.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed shiny hover inputs
  • Fixed tooltip bounding so it does not overflow container

d3RZoomableTreemap 0.2

Major Changes

  • Added d3_nest2 to convert data to a hierarchy that d3 expects
  • Added tooltip to treemap that consider col_name

Minor Changes

  • Added parameters for breadcrumb help text
  • Added parameter to enable custom number formating
  • Updated events to include hover and clicked and data for id, label and value
  • Fix bug where tibbles would not work with d3_nest2

d3RZoomableTreemap 0.1

Features

  • Zoomable Treemap in D3v5 based on Mike Bostocks zoomable treemap. Only two levels of the hierarchy are visible at a time. Mouseover to see child. Parent data does not overflow
  • Event clicks outputed to shiny.
  • Custom rectangle colour either through adding color variable to data or setting the background variable using an html colour name or the hexcode.
  • Custom header colour.
  • Responsive text colour, that will be either black or white depending on background colour.

Contents

Developed by Luke Heley.
